availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah E. Waits VanDeren in Harrison County on May 13, 1856. Father of Edward Franklin Vanderen, Anna Flora Vanderen, and Elizabeth A. Vanderen. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 151.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film #000216896, p. 92.
Find A Grave, "James Vanderen (October 18, 1821-January 31, 1899)," Memorial #165293054, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/165293054 (accessed November 2, 2018).
